local_intent: Confirm approach to white_plate, attempt pick (with retries) and verify object in gripper
assumptions: Gripper is open and robot has been moved above white_plate prior to approach
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach/align -> pick -> verify sequence matching the GLOBAL_BT around ApproachAndAlign; uses the precomputed w_plate_grasp key and verifies ObjectInGripper as in GLOBAL_BT.
